values:
Christmas didn't suck.  I could've delt with less dad though.  The rest of my family isn't a pain in the ass, but gee, what's got him so pissy lately?  Since like the 22 he's just been snapping and fuming at me, and then he seems totally fine later.  But he keeps doing that.  I turn up my music in the car so I don't hear him bitching to my mom.  How can she put up with him?  And he only talks about the stuff that has wronged him, his problems, things that involves him. >> I can understand why he would consiter that worth talking about, but come on!  If that's all he ever talks about, why try to talk to him?

He yelled at me last night after I tried to watch tv.  He was still eating, but I had already waited like ten minutes for him to finish and he was the only one eating.  Then today, he made a sandwitch for himself and david.  Dave said he didn't like the sandwitch, and dad started to call him names.  "Picky little shit" comes to mind.  I could go on but I'm about ranted out.

I got some nifty stuff for christmas.  Dave got me March of the Penguins.  Mom got me a little penguin plush, and I got a video iPod.  I also got some jewelry and some shirts.  My aunt got me a new saxophone case (yes! I really needed one) and my uncle gave me money. xD I'll probably buy Sims2 with the cash.  Oh, and I also got DDR.  Surprisingly, I don't suck. o:

My mother's parents are special.  My grandpa had me read this article about leading a better life, and it did have some good points in it.  It was about this speaker that came to talk to a group of girls in the town, and it said stuff like you're shooting for looks that aren't real, and showed them pictures of britney spears before and after make-up, and that sort of thing.  It also said this car thing which I didn't understand.  But, it had kind of a pro-christian tone to it, and listed praying and going to church in his five tips for a better life. o.o

At my uncle's house on christmas, he fired up his hot tub.  So that's how I finished my christmas holiday.  Outside, in 40 degree weather, sitting in my uncle's clothes inside a big pot of near-boiling water.  It's a lot better than it sounds, though. xD After that I was really sleepy but couldn't do anything about it, so I was just kinda sitting around... o.o Yep.
Merry Christmas everyone and have a happy new year in case I don't get to talk to you.  Maybe we can get together sometime next week.  Have a good holiday.

I loved the book V for Vendetta.  I hope I'll love the movie.

"The details of my death were highly... exaggerated."-V

"Remember, remember, the fifth of November..."-Guy Fawkes (not actually in the book or movie)

"People should not be afriad of their governments, governements should be afraid of their people."-V

I remember all those from the book, but they are in the trailers too.

http://vforvendetta.warnerbros.com/trailer.html

For the past three days I've had nightmares.  I can't remember the first two but I remember last nights.  It looked like something out of JTHM.  The way the guy was drawn, anyway.  Yes, drawn, it's my dream so shut up.

This guy is like 30 or 40, ponytail, creepy, sometimes little red dots on his face.  He wore all black.  We were in a room and out the window there was a blank desert scene.  No cactuses or any sort of life, just... ground.  Not even sand.  Well, maybe sand.  No movement though.  He didn't have any lights on, but his computer was on.  It lit up the room with like a blue-ish glow.  It made a glare on his glasses so I couldn't see his eyes.  He was talking about an alien called Charlie.  And how the world is going to be destroyed when Charlie comes.  

Then it cuts to a house, it's all bright and sunny out, you know the kind, and a salesman is trying to get the family to join like this cult of alien thingies, and they do.  I can't remember everything that happened.  But I remember it kept flashing back and forth between the creepy guy in the deserted room in the desert and the blond salesman with shiney teeth recruiting cult members.  And he kept trying to get me to join.  I said no.  My friends and family joined.  I still said no.  I tried to get the creepy guy to help me when it flashed back to him but he wouldn't help, he just smiled at me.  I didn't like it when he smiled.

Then at the very end of the dream, I go back to where the salesman guy is, and he's whimpering and cowering and screaming and stuff.  It's because the sky is all dark and the buildings are on fire and things are falling down.  And his cult is all dressed in identical robes of white and gold and they have these weird helmets but it doesn't seem to be doing a lot against the apocolyse that the ponytail guy said was coming.  I try to talk to the salesman but he's all screamy and crying and stuff, and I'm looking around, wondering what to do... Then I see this girl.  She's like right between being a kid and being a teen, you know the age, and she's got this long blond hair and bright blue eyes and she's kind of anime-y.  And she's looking around like she doesn't know what to do either.  And I just know that she's Charlie, and I have to talk to her.  So I start to run over, but I wake up then.

It's 4 10 in the morning when I woke up.  That dream scared me.  I don't know why my dream catcher has stopped working...  When I tried to close my eyes after that I kept seeing these tenticle thingies that were all black and sprouting up and one of the tenticles was more of a stub and had a mouth.  

Any thoughts?  Anyone?

Grr...  I hate the choir.  So much.  We had an afterschool rehersal today.  There's like 8 different choirs.  The very first choir took five times to get their song right.  One.  Song.  Five.  Gr.  >>  The choirs took FOREVER.  When I left, we were backed up an hour.  Who knows how far behind the whole show will get by the end off it.  Our band was the twelfth to go.  We were just begining at 5 15.  o.o  I am so pissed.  Plus I had cramps all day.  Bonus fun.

Friend Like Me-

Well Ali Baba had them forty thieves
Scheherezad-ie had a thousand tales
But master you in luck 'cause up your sleeves
You got a brand of magic never fails
You got some power in your corner now
Some heavy ammunition in your camp
You got some punch, pizzazz, yahoo and how
See all you gotta do is rub that lamp
And I'll say

Mister Aladdin, sir
What will your pleasure be?
Let me take your order
Jot it down
You ain't never had a friend like me
No no no

Life is your restaurant
And I'm your maitre d'
C'mon whisper what it is you want
You ain't never had a friend like me

Yes sir, we pride ourselves on service
You're the boss
The king, the shah
Say what you wish
It's yours! True dish
How about a little more Baklava?

Have some of column "A"
Try all of column "B"
I'm in the mood to help you dude
You ain't never had a friend like me

Can your friends do this?
Do your friends do that?
Do your friends pull this out their little hat?
Can your friends go, poof?
Well, looky here
Can your friends go, Abracadabra, let 'er rip
And then make the sucker disappear?

So doncha sit there slack jawed, buggy eyed
I'm here to answer all your midday prayers
You got me bona fide, certified
You got a genie for your chare d'affaires
I got a powerful urge to help you out
So what-cha wish? I really wanna know
You got a list that's three miles long, no doubt
Well, all you gotta do is rub like so - and oh

Mister Aladdin, sir, have a wish or two or three
I'm on the job, you big nabob
You ain't never had a friend, never had a friend
You ain't never had a friend, never had a friend
You ain't never had a friend like me
You ain't never had a friend like me, hah!

-Genie

Bleeeech.  I feel sick. x_x

Anyway, we're going to the music store later today.  I'm going to buy a tuner.  I really need one.  The theatre room where our band has to practice doesn't have a tuner and I don't know anyone with one so us tenors, still one of the best sections I might add, are going untuned.  We should probably at least tune to each other but we can't be bothered.  xD  We just don't care enough to honestly.  I want to play jazz music now. o.o oh! whoa! I gotta go.  We're going to the music store in like 5 minutes.  I gotta split.  Like a banana. o.o I like bananas.

Okay! ta!

You Have a Choleric Temperament
You are a person of great enthusiasm - easily excited by many things. Unsatisfied by the ordinary, you are reaching for an epic, extraordinary life. You want the best. The best life. The best love. The best reputation. You posses a sharp and keen intellect. Your mind is your primary weapon. Strong willed, nothing can keep you down. Your energy can break down any wall. You're an instantly passionate person - and this passion gives you an intoxicating power over others. At your worst, you are a narcissist. Full of yourself and even proud of your faults. Stubborn and opinionated, you know what you think is right. End of discussion. A bit of a misanthrope, you often see others as weak, ignorant, and inferior.
What Temperment Are You?
After seeing miranda's I felt compelled. o.o

Wow.  Its been a while since I made an entry. o.o Yep.  Tada.  ...

I like this song.  Sore Thumb by The Format.  People think its emo. o.o I don't think so.

forgive me you cut out again,
it seems so easy just to blame the reception
but theres something wrong
and i dont know why
why you, you never say goodnight

so please just leave,
you dont mean that much to me
you keep the ring, ill take those saturdays in bed
cause i know you need them
as for me its nothing new
just another two years

i wish we'd always wake up new,
refreshed and born again
with nothing left to lose
but we dream too much
and who needs a crutch
pull off the bandage, theres no wound

so please just leave,
you dont mean that much to me
give back the ring,
keep all those summers with your friends
cause you know you need them
as for me its nothing new
just another two years

well im here losing sleep 
your sore thumb,
your best defense is miles from home
oh and it reads like a letter,
with the words all broken
erased them with a razorblade
cause you're gone
i was lost then i found you
but im breaking down now that 

your sore thumb,
your best defense is miles from home
oh and it reads like a letter,
with the words all broken
erased them with a razorblade
cause you're gone

you're gone


See, I think those are really pretty lyrics.  I like that song.  I already said that. o.o  I am not hungry but I am not full.  Its cold in here.  Brr.  I'm shivering. o.o  I wish I had wings.  I would fly all night and dive in and out of the low clouds.  But I would have a waterproof bag with a towel in it so I could wipe off the water when I get too cold.  And a sweater.  Maybe a heavy coat.  I would imagine its cold up there.  But I wish I had wings all the same.  At the very least, I could wrap them around myself and keep me warm.

Last night my im shut off at ten as usual 'cause of that stupid lock.  I called Vik at 10 30ish 'cause I wanted to.  Then we talked until 12 30, when my dad caught me.  >>  Then we had a "disscution" where he yelled at me for a half hour.  Then I cried for another hour and a half and fell asleep around 2 30.  I got up and went to school and Celeste and I complained about our parents and pissed of Julie, who claims that "parents always want to help."  Which, as we all know, it utter bullshit.  Parents say no for completely idiotic reasons.  Anyway, I was dance-y the rest of the day, and then got home and went upstairs.  Then the phone went ring ring ring for the next few hours.  People have nothing better to do than to call my house.  o.o  Then I did my homework.  I'm not totally done but I had, litterally, a shitload of Japanese to do, that is not all due tomorrow.  I might still color the extra credit homework... but yeah... I dunno.  Then dad came home and made me listen to his stories and talk about the birds and bees.... again..... X__x  Grah.  Luckily, my cat was there to back me up. ^^ Frisky is my gay best friend. o.o He is there to stand up for me man.  Every time dad says something that makes me want to run away really fast Frisky goes "Meph!" in a really adgitated tone.  Then goes over to head-but me.  =D  Frisky is my saviour, man.  I was about ready to punch dad if reinforcements hadn't showed up. xD  Anyway, he cut my im down to 9 for tonight and next week. >> And he's making me charge the cell in his room now.  But I get until 9 05 right now because I hugged my mom. xD  Weird.  Yeppers.  o.o  I shouldn't say yeppers.  Should I? I don't know. o.o

Ta!
-Liz
I feel like I am absorbing this music. o.o

I like having Dave as my little brother.  Right now, its about to storm, and he is walking to the nature preserve to get me and him some sodas.  He is a very sweet kid.  Kinda creepy though.  I think I liked it better when I didn't know what that smell in his room was.

I can't wait until thanksgiving break. =) It will be a lot of fun.  I'm sleeping over at my awesome aunts house for a night.  We are going to have lots of fun.  I like to cook, and we will be cooking part of the time.  So yay.

I think I might fail social studies. o.o I hate geography.  I am sooo bad at it.  And we have geography quizes every Friday.  I mean, I am really, REALLY bad at geography.  Like, for the first six or seven years of my life I thought that India was Veitnam. o.o Then when I found out that Inida was India, I thought there were two Indias and that one of the India's was Vietnam... I can't even spell Veitnam right... o.o

Dave is back with Sunkist. (:

I left school early today.  I will tell you why, I will.  Someone decided to put a blender in my uterus and turn it on MAX. ^^ Of course.  Yep.  Murder.  Death.  Die.  Kill.  Destory.  That's what I felt like in 6th period and called mom so I could leave.  And she picked me up.  And I left.  And went home.  And laid with something scorching hot on my stomach (bucky!) for an hour and a half.  Then I felt better, came upstairs, and lit a bunch of candles.  Now the house smells like hot dogs. xD

Then later I felt emo and laid down in the shower until the hot water ran out.  Then I got cold and snuggled in my bed until mom told me to fold the laundry.  So I did.  And I talked to my dad.  He is on the 19th floor.  That is very high up.

I got first chair in concert band. (:  Out of two... o.o  But still.  (:

It turns out I am kinda scared of upperclassmen.  Huh.  Who knew. o.o

I am happy.  It's been quite a while since I've felt this good.  ^^  I have my bag full of beans heated up.  I love it.  I can't belive I have negelected it this long.  Its amazing.  You just throw it in the microwave and the beans heat up and stay all warm... its called a Bucky.  Its amazing for any sort of cramp or discomfort.  Its so wonderful.  ^^  Everyone should have a Bucky.  They are like the most perfect weight in the world too.  Its so comforting. ^^

I was in the bath for like... an hour and a half.  The water was still warm.  There was no crap floating around.  I had bath conffeti o:  I didn't know there was such a thing!  I love it!  And it smells so good... not like perfume at all.  Like a minty lime almost.  It makes the bath all bubbly.  But its more fun than bubble bath.

Its all good. ^^

Neeha has a wonderful thing on her binder.  It's a picture of a sign that says "Road Wet When It Rains" xD

I love it.

Julie made me mad today.  She was saying that all boy were idiotic bastards because a group of boys sat at our table during lunch.  They keep taking away tables. >>

I actually survied marching band.  o.o  That's amazing.  I didn't:

1. get trampled during the 3rd, 5th, or 6th numbers.
2. get hit in the head by a trombone, tuba, or other big instrument.
3. get run over by the pit equipment.
4. piss anyone off enough to make them murder me.
5. finally lose it and go on a murder/suicide path.

It's wonderful...  I'm so happy... report cards came out today.  I can list my grades but I don't want to.  They were pretty good but not my best.  Dad yelled at me for my Japanese grade, which is dumb 'cause I got a B... o.o

Reasons my dad is kinda dumb:

1. he yelled at me for getting a B in japanese
2. he lied about taking us to the white stripes concert
3. he wouldn't let me go to the blood brother concert
4. he wants me to go to bed at 11 but he goes to sleep at 10 so he is not awake to enforce his own rule
5. the other day he offered the victoria's secret catolouge to dave ._.

And many many more.

Who needs sleep?

1. infants
2. most bandies from Jerome
3. my mother
4. the cats, apparently
5. the sun

Reasons I should do band next year:

1. Alison will be there
2. Disney
3. It actually is kinda fun
4. There will be new freshman so I won't feel like the worst marcher
5. Tenors half-ass everything so its not like I have to be great
6. I met a lot of new people from band

Reasons I shouldn't do band next year:

1. a lot of extra stress
2. it takes a lot of time
3. I'm paranoid and think that a lot of the people I meet don't like me o.o
4. I suck at memorizing music
5. It trashes my reeds

I had potatoes earlier today.  They are amazing.  I wish I was still eating them.
I found a cd and there were special pictures on it! xD I have one of dan with a silly mustache.

Dad was in rare form tonight.

Here is the quote that sticks out, "Dave buttered his potato like a sex toy."

o.o

Need I say more?

I think I must.  Why would you butter a sex toy?  You wouldn't.  My dad is weird.  I view him as an opponent.  He just figured that out tonight.

I feel too hot. x_x I feel like my insides are on fire.  I tried to put it out with Mountain Dew.  It's not working.  I feel nauseous.  I think I caught something at the football game Friday.

The tenors did not go to see saw. ): Not enough people wanted to.  I would have pushed the matter but I am terrified of Adam.  I need to give myself a pep talk before saying a sentence to him.  Seriously.  I have nightmares about Adam glaring at me.  I run from him then find a little cottage.  I go into the cottage and find a group of people with scraggly hair giggling around a fire.  I join in, and soon they all pull out samurai swords and shove them into their stomachs and slice until their guts spill out.  Then they giggled some more.  They offered me a sword but I said no thank you.  After they all fell over laughing and started to pass out I left to find a drug dealer.  I had that nightmare a few times.  I never did figure out what it means.  It's stopped, though.  Any ideas what it means? o.o  It is very confusing.

Row dinner was still fun though.  We went to taco bell.  Brian Davis took forever eating his enchiladas so Steven went in Adam's car instead.  I could have gone, but I always ride with B'Nav because I am scared of Adam, as I have already said.  Then we went to Comp USA and considered buying games and Bawls.  I have never had any Bawls. (Bawls is an energy drink with an insane about of caffeine in it, in case you were wondering.)  I should go buy some sometime and give it a try.  I got a two liter of Mountain Dew from row decorations, though, and have been drinking it all day so far.  I used to drink mountain dew back in ada like it was a necessary thing for my survival.  Anyway, after we left comp usa, we went over to a senior percussionist named calvin's house and we jumped on his trampoline.  I had to wait to jump on it until everyone else got off, though.  It was dress up day for the band and I forgot to bring pants other than my marching stuff for that night so I had to be on by myself to hold down my skirt.  They got thirsty jumping and Adam said that someone should go to check to see if his door was open.  So I went.  While I was going to check they were all laughing and I heard someone say, "Oh yeah, go make it look like the freshman is breaking the law."  o.o  I don't get it.  Does it matter that I am a freshman?  I don't understand.  His door was locked, though.  I could have tried the back door but didn't want to try to find it.  It was hidden by the bushes. xD

It was very very cold at the football game.  My whole lips, like not just the red part but all around it too, turned purple.  That is probably where I got sick.  xD 

I was ten minutes late to state finals.  No one yelled at me.  That bothers me.  I don't get yelled at when I am bad.  I wish they would yell at me.  It makes me feel like they are just silently mad at me instead.  If they yelled I would know if they were mad.  But I don't know.  Maybe I can just do anything I want and not get in trouble? o.o?

I lit some candles because it smells very bad in here.  Mom got the carpets cleaned.  We are now one of those annoying families that force people to take their shoes off when they come in even for a moment.  Oh well.  The carpets will be dirty again soon.

I just found out that Jerome made the play offs.  I hope I get to march there.

I just saw the Coffman Play today.  It has a name but I didn't learn it.  It was cool.  There were murderers and a scary theatre guy and many many courpses.  Why can't Jerome have plays like that? xD Ours are about dogs.  Whoopee.  But I do like dogs though.  So it all works out.  I think our next play is Cheaper By The Dozen. o.o  I'm hoping it isn't and that paper I saw was for something else.  Whoa.  Saw is was spelled backwards and was is saw spelled backwards.  Whoa!!! O:

I am pretty bored.  I have homework but really don't want to do it. >> I'm being lazy.  Yay.

Tomorrow is a late start day! =D  I don't have to wake up early tomorrow. ^^  I think I will get up at six, or even six thirty!!! xD
(That is early for me.  I am speical.)

I got pumpkins today.  We are carving them tomorrow.  I don't know what I want mine to look like though.

Why is everyone doing their homework right now?  They have all of tomorrow morning too.  Maybe they want to sleep in.

I want to be friends with Nirvana Boy.  I don't know his real name but he was wearing a Nirvana shirt today in English class.  I used to call him the Blonde Boy but he got all his hair cut and now he has a buzz cut thing.  He annoyed me at first but he has been really cool the past few days.  If only I could talk to strangers. xD

I went to the Japanese Club party today.  That was a lot of fun. ^^

I could not make my hair a mohawk. ):  Not enough time or glue.

We watched Cowboy Bebop the Movie.  It was pretty good.  I had no idea who anyone was.  I zoned out during a lot of it then came back and was like... whoa...  what happened o.o  It was pretty special. xD

We watched another movie too where no one had any idea what the movie was about.  At all.  At any point during the movie. xD  There was this guy called Tetsuo or something and he had magical powers and so did these three wrinkly green kids and Tetsuo made this machine thing blow up or something and then a cult decided to worship him and some guy called akira but akira turned out to be a dismembered courpse and then Tetsuo got his arm blown off and he put together a new one out of random machine parts using his magic to construct it in like half a second.  And then the machine and the magic and Tetsuo all blended into a giant mushy machine monster thingy that smushed everyone but then the wrinkly green kids called akira and used magic to put the courpse back together into a ghost somehow. o.o And akira made a giant blue bubble and swooped up Tetsuo and the kids and vanished.  Then the other people were crying and scared and confused, then they all grinned and the movie was over.  Right before the credits ran, a voice said "Boku wa Tetsuo" (I am Tetsuo).  So we were all very confused but there was a lot of blood and gore and fire so we all thought the movie was pretty good.

Oh, one more thing about the movie.  At the cult part, there was a scary old woman riding on a cart thing.  She was starting fires. xD
"Let the pure flames take away your unclean heart and body!  Do not fear for the pain of the body, for the flames will clean your heart!" that was what she was yelling. x)  Doesn't it make you feel warm inside?

Lately my life has been very full of sarcastic humor. o.o

The other day in band I felt very anxious and sacred for no reason.  I was totally flipping out over nothing.  Eyes wide and kind of twitching anxious/scared.  It was chaotic around me; people werw switching instruments and playing each others and the purcussionists were napping in the shade of their drums and everyone was out of their spot and runing around and shouting and it was blazing sun but not hot and it's always like that at the start of practice but it was really freaking me out this time for some reason. O.O

And then I screwed up baaad at practice. >>  Like a lot.  Like seven large noticeable mistakes.  There are six songs in our show.  You do the math.  Then I sat down outside and was emo for a while until dad picked us up.  Then he yelled at me for not talking to him or making eye contact the whole ride home. o.o  So there were signs that it would be a chaotic practice/after practice and it WAS.

And then this morning I was sad and worried.  And we went outside during science class.  And I was reciving the sound or something...it's such a useless class I don't pay attention... anyway, I had doodled an emo lookin' guy on the section of the worksheet where we were supposed to draw the experiment.  And I was emo while we were doing the experiment. Whoa. xD

So today when I saw a penny on the ground with tails up I was like oh no! and ran away before I was tempted to pick it up.  And then life was good.  Julie called me a name in Spanish but I didn't know what it was.  And I think I'm getting on Prasanthi's nerves.  Oh well.  It's high school.

I finished the book Speak today.  After the first marking period the book gets good.  I liked David.  He was cool.  Melinda and I would have gotten along very well.  Heather made me mad from the beginning. >> Stupid sell out.

And I attacked Julie with a marker today.

I'm avoiding doing my work.  I can't remember what I have.

I'm sad that I missed a trip to the cemetery.  Oh well.  I can go with you later, Vik. xD
(Everyone that isn't Vik: I told him I would show him the graveyards around Dublin.  Can't remember why.)

We are twenty pages into the book Speak.  I cannot stand the book Speak at the moment.  I can relate to everything so far and I wish I couldn't.  Only I don't have an art class.  I wish I did.  Band is so fucking stressful for me.  I'm so bad at it.  I wasn't friends with any bandies in middle school so now I don't know what to talk about with the ones I am now around for two solid hours every day. >>

I went to the zoo a few days ago. o: It was a lot of fun.  I stayed longer with my brother.  We ate Sabarros and went through the snake house.  David yelled at a small child to be careful around the snakes.  And we went to see birds.  I liked the birds more than Dave did.  He just sort of sat there while two birds sat on my arm.  But it was fun.  Then we saw kangaroos.  Then I started missing my friends a whole lot, so we called mom and told her we were ready to leave.  But then I had a lot of work to do when I got home and couldn't go blow up soda. ): I wish I could have gone.

Julie might take me to Florida with her family on vacation at some point.  Julie is very nice to me.  She is my friend.  But she still reminds me of a skippy puppy sometimes.

I have a peacock postcard.  It's spifftastic.  I was going to send it to Vik but I sort of want it for my door.  o.o  Does he even like peacocks?  I hope so.  They are amazing.  Well, he owes me a letter anyway, so I will keep it for now. xD

(I like my new blob thing.)

TELL ME ABOUT YOURSELF - The Survey
Name:Liz Hudak
Birthday:May 20, 1991
Birthplace:Anarbor Michigan
Current Location:...on the moon. of course.
Eye Color:green
Hair Color:red
Height:5'3"
Right Handed or Left Handed:right
Your Heritage:German, Slovak, Hungarian, French
The Shoes You Wore Today:the ones that fit o.o
Your Weakness:flattery. and cake.
Your Fears:abandonment
Your Perfect Pizza:pizza that is not school pizza nor pizza I get second dibs on because dad has friends over
Goal You Would Like To Achieve This Year:...
Your Most Overused Phrase On an instant messenger:okay
Thoughts First Waking Up:fuck, that damn alram already!?!
Your Best Physical Feature:my face
Your Bedtime:xD yeah right. not constant enough to have one.
Your Most Missed Memory:my grandpa taking me on rides with his bike
Pepsi or Coke:Coke, bitch >(
MacDonalds or Burger King:Burger King
Single or Group Dates:I hate crowds.
Lipton Ice Tea or Nestea:o.o there's a difference?
Chocolate or Vanilla:I don't discriminate
Cappuccino or Coffee:meh
Do you Smoke:no
Do you Swear:yep

Only three weeks left of band.  Steven's right knee is unreliable so I may have to march again this weekend.  That means I would miss my family thing on Saturday.

I saw another recluse spider today.  It's right outside a junior bandie's house.  If its still there tomorrow I'm going to spray it with scorpian killer or something.  There are so many people that run through there all the time that it could bite someone really easily.  And for some reason no one except me ever notices spiders until a few days after they are there.  I hope they see it and recognize it before it can hurt them.  Unless one of the asshats live there.  Then maybe he can get bitten.  But I don't think so.  I don't think I know the guy.  But you never know.

We have to sell cheese and sausage for band.  As well as christmas stuff.  On the cover of the Christmas magazine there are two 6-year-old lesbian angels about to kiss.  It's pretty funny.

I was mad at the Alex thing today. >>

It needs to trip and fall on and gouge its eye out on its mouthpiece.

I went too far back on one move the first time we marched through it that day, and it tried to correct me.  Um...  What the hell?  A lot of people didn't make their spots that time and I was avoiding the trumpets so we don't crash into them, asshat.  I know I was back too far, but there is a reason that after a tiny mistake like that the squad leaders say "Don't talk about it" becuase it won't happen again and isn't a big problem if it does. >>

And then I was going back to my spot and I passed through the spot right next to it.  And it yelled, "Liz, where the hell are you going?"  And I said, "My spot's back there..."  And he looked around and was like "ooo yeah" and I was just like oh my god you know that Adam stands next to you and he is a freaking giant how can you forget?! Ugh. >>

I will have a little party if it gets hurt.  With streamers and cake.

I gotta make a public statement.

1. No longer mad at Dan; turns out it was not his fault that I was ignored.  I was really mad when I wrote that last thing and I'm too lazy to delete it so I'll do this instead.

2. Even when it's by accident, it still hurts me when you ignore me, especially since I specifically asked if that was going to happen.  That specific time didn't bother me so much but this isn't the first time it's happened and that has been fruterating as I don't see you all much as it is.

3. Kazoku means family in Japanese.

4. I know that it's not as big a deal as I made it out to be, so I'm sorry if I caused offense but I was mad.

5. Dispite the various referances stating otherwise, Dan is, in fact, a male.

Thank you for your time.  This has been a public service announcement.  The regular scedual may now continue.

I have so much homework to do. ):

Like... 40 math questions, three sections in SS, and a summery for science.  That's a lot to be due tomorrow. ;_;  And yes, all of it is due then.

I'm mad at Dan.  I was talking to her on the phone and she said she was going to hang up.  And I asked if she hung up would she still be talking to me on the im?  And she said yes.  Well, I left for a few minutes and came back and started talking again.  They all lost intrest.  >(  So that's why I'm mad.  I'll be over it as soon as Dan apologizes but until then rawr.

Vik is away for real right now.  In between being mad at Dan and my family being hypnotized by that glowing cube downstairs and Vik being away I'm rather lonely.

Oh good, Vik is back! (:

Well, today I went back to school.  Goddammit mother fucker is all I can say.  I have so much Japanese homework that I might have to kidnap a Japanese person and make them help me.

Tomorrow we are having row dinner at B'nav's house.  I like B'nav.  He's so nice to me.  He is one of the only people that is nice to me in band, now that I think of it.  I'm not saying everyone else has a problem with me, but it's like I'm invisible or like a walking potato with an antenne stuck out of my head to everyone except for him and my friends.  Or does he fall under the catagory of friend?  I don't know.  Anyway, I will refuse to let band ruin my good mood tomorrow.  Octoberfest is this weekend and I intend to start off my weekend good.

I'm getting a little hungry.  Ate dinner at 5 30 'cause I got hungry.  Have had like two oreos since then.  So yeah.  Little hungry.  But 5 hours no food is nothing.  I really should do my english homework soon.  I just reeeally don't want to.

So I sit here.  My feet are cold.  Let me go sock them.

Okay, feet have been sufficently socked. ^^ Now...

I do not have whooping cough and my walking pnemonia is almost gone.  Those are both good pieces of news.

I am cold.  It's cold in here.  That's probably why.  And my hair is wet.  Another reason why.  So yeah.

Why, yes, I did have a good day today, dispite its lack of art fair-ness.  That's cool because when I was sad about it, it started to rain!!!! =D  Rain makes me so happy.  And it rained on me and washed away my troubles and I went home and was very happy.  Then I finished all my math with barely any help from Vik!  That is more of an achivement than most of you know. xD And I finally got goggles which I am wearing around.

And mom still hasn't noticed the silly putty on my mirror.  I despretely need a picture of it.  It's just too cool not to have one. xD

Octoberfest is soon!!! Yay! =D Even though all my friends decided to go to a dance that they are going to have for the next four years instead of go to a German festival with me which I may not be allowed to take anyone again (I am being passive aggressive ^^) and only two of them have real reasons not to come, I still really want to go myself.  Oh, no, three of them have real reasons.  o.o  Yeah.

Who they are you prolly know.  So yep.

Four if you count Kathy who must stay to sport her collar.

My German outfit is almost finished!!! =D I'm so excited.  I want despretely to wear it to school some Monday.  It would be so great!  (Monday is the only day I don't have band after school.  So that's why Monday.)

So I think everyone should respond to this.  I really do.
I'm smiling so hard my cheeks hurt. ^^

Oh my god.  It is so fucking hot in here.  And I am so bored I don't have any kind of word for it.

I officially am busy, and officially don't have anything interesting to say.  No clue how those go hand-in-hand because tipically if you're busy things happen to you.  But not lately.

I was late for band today.  Adam didn't say anything; just glared.  He really hates me.  He just really really hates me.  And Amanda is getting pissed off at me too for whatever reason.  She's stopped talking to me.  I don't think she likes me anymore.  I have no idea why.  o.o  It's odd.  No clue.  The only thing I could possibly think of was that I didn't vote for her friend for the Japanese club secritary, but that seems like a dumb reason to stop talking to someone.

My cat is complaining.  I want to complain too.  It's really fucking hot in here. >>  It actually makes me wish I had a tub of ice to lay down in to cool off even though I would just freeze all my nerves.  That would be nice.  It's probably my room.

I'm "talking" to people right now.  I have nothing to talk about.  I hate being boring.

So yeah.  I'm bored and hot.

I don't wanna whine again, so I'll say this and the breif overveiw:

This was a bad peace day.

Julie Z. was being stupid and deeply offended me.

No one can come to Octoberfest with me.

On the plus side, all my friends will be having fun that day.  And I will get to walk around in costume.  I get a wreath.  And a new traditional German outfit.  And maybe even a decent picture of myself.  Perhaps if I go alone I'll meet up with someone else there and they can be my friend for the day.

It's just... I had three people that said they would go with me if they were allowed to.  None of them can.  It's kind of frusterating.

That was pretty cool.  Especially for my dad.

Okay, I just made a few entries private because they were annoying and emo and I really don't wanna remember those days like that.

If I can rememeber those days at all. o.o

Apparently, there are people selling drugs at the Jerome football games! o:  A girl in homeroom told me.  Then I told it to Sally who just said, "Welcome to Dublin" and laughed.  But Dubin's not a cracktown. o.O  There's a ton of towns a lot worse. Sure, counting this I can name four places where you can get drugs, but we're right next to Columbus so wouldn't they have most of the drugs?

Or would it just slink its way over here?

I dunno.  Well, now you guys have a reason to come over and see me march. xD

(I really like that grey cat under my mood.)

http://www.local6.com/news/4978002/detail.html


Wow.

Meep, was this you!? xD

Today was just kinda yup.  Yup.  Got in trouble.  Got out of trouble.  Was late for school.  Made it to all classes on time anyway.  Went to first Japanese club meeting of the year.  Wrote down my name and email.  Went to band; forgot white shirt, had to borrow one of Adam's.  Kate was sick; Adam had to teach Steven all of Kate's positions and stuff in about a half hour so he could march her place.  We walked, about seven minutes, to a free meal, and everyone whined about it.  "It's so hot.  I'm so tired.  My instrument is too heavy."  We get free fucking food and it's five minutes away.  Oh gee.  And it's Chipotle!  Then Julie complained that all the burritos had beans on them and I was just like.... yeah... you do that.  I don't care; not my problem.

Marched in game.  Sucked horribly.  Found that I didn't care much about that.  Went home, had "disscussion" with my parents, and then called Vik.  We mostly sit in silence on the phone.  That's what's happening right now.  w00t.  Oh, and I took a shower.  Yup.

This is my life.  It would be more interesting if there weren't so much band in it.

I have had a good weekend overall.  Been kinda sick.  Hasn't bothered me much.  My headband is gonna hurt me in an hour or two.  I got tired of blowing my hair out of my face every time the fan swings by.

Vik has been sick all weekend! D:  Mom won't let me go visit him.  She's either cheap or lazy. >(  It's very insulting.  Granted, she doesn't know we hooked up, and I don't intend to tell her.  Not yet, anyway.  Maybe never.  She doesn't need to know.  Well she might.  I don't know.

School tomorrow! NO.  IT WILL NOT BE SO.  >(  School is a horrible thing; designed to make me sad and separate me from those who care about me.  It seems like it, anyway.  Maybe not.  And if I don't go, who will feed the salamander?  Well, this one is for you, Simon the salamander.  

Well, Vik tried to teach me to count to ten in hindi so I could tell what number B'Nav and Adam were at when they count that in marching band, but it turned into a I'll-list-all-the-swear-words-I-know-in-hindi thing.  He knows a lot of them.  I only remember choda.  Chouda is fourteen.  Very useful, I know.  I bet you that I won't be able to pronounce either of those.  I do know the numbers et and teen, which is one and three.  So there you go.  I know four words. xD

I talked to Megan and we talked about dreams and poems.  Megan's cool like that.

I watched Saw at Dan's house.  It was very good.  It was only tense in one part; but always very interesting.  The serial killer was a genius; you didn't know who he was until the end.  It was so great; I loved it.  I loved the cop.  I was very sad when he got sliced.  Then happy when he turned out to be alive.  Then sad again when he was shot.  Then I laughed and laughed with the dolls; I loved the dolls.  I like dolls which is probably why.  I never thought they were creepy; even now when I see 'creepy' dolls I think they are absolutely adorable.  I don't know why.  Perhaps I really do feel a need to take care of everyone.  But there are people I really just want to let die and suffer.  Everyone else I rarely care if they live or die.  Perhaps it's only cool people I care about.  I've always loved dolls.  But yeah, you get it.

I have money in a vase now.  I need a lid for my money vase.  I don't like the idea of an open top on it; though you can't get to the money through the tiny hole at the top.  You have to tip it.

My grandpa is almost completely better!  He drove down here today and can walk without a walker and is getting his tan back and fed squirrels the other day!!!  ^^  I'm so happy that he's getting so much better.  Still not how he used to be, but I'll take this one over the one a few months ago.

I'm very happy.  For a number of reasons.  I won't bother listing them.  Because there are many of them.

So yeah, my last entry was monster emo.  And since none of you have spoken to me about it I have decided that in every twenty entries we get two emo ones, or one monster emo.  So I used up my emo entries.  Ta da.
xD

I am in the weirdest mood.  I'm talking to Vik.  So what's new, I know.  Well, it's two, and I got up at four yesterday.  I'm trying to go 24 hours, or at least match Vik.  I don't know where he went, though, he's not responding.  The mofoci. xD  You don't have to understand that.  I think it's funny.

So I marched at half time in the game today.  Fun, I know.  I really love my saxophone.  I dislike being alone.  I don't mind marching.  I hate when people are subtle about things I do wrong and crap.  It makes me want to bite them.  

Whoa, forgot where I was for a second.

I'm here.  Okay.  Good.

Tomorrow I'm going birthday shopping for three people.  Dad, Dave, and Vikram.  Possibly Kat and Jenny and Dan if, by some streach of the imagination, I still have money left.  Too many people have birthdays at the end of the year.  Plus then Christmas, and for my friends that don't celebrate Christmas, New Years because no one should be left out... umm... I can't think of anything else this very second. So yeah.

I fell asleep in math today, but only for a second.  Still.  It's weird.

Well, I'm gonna be done.

I don't have a hell of a lot to report.  All my friends are sad, suicidal, or depressed right now.  I can only try to cheer them up, I don't do the best job I could, but I do better the more I learn about them.  I really hate listening to most people complain, but my close friends could bitch for days and days about anything and everything and I would listen and nod and try to help.  I only have a few good friends, and I love them all and will do anything to keep them happy and my friends.  Really.

Jenny's just in bad shape, Miranda's depressed, Meep and Dan are always mad, Kathy's negelcted, Julie is flacky and half blind...    My new friends aren't much better.

Julie (new Julie) is kinda squeaky and worries about stuff.  Nice girl but veeery insecure.  Not one of my closest friends, and I won't listen when she complains the way she does....   Not much, anyway.  Michelle is really nice to me and I like her, and even though Meep does not like I her, I think, I THINK, I'll be able to have her as a friend anyway.  

As for Vikram, he's the stablest friend I have.  Which is kinda sad when you think about it.  Not that his life is all peaches and whistles and birds either.  At the moment we're counting how many toes we can fit in our mouthes.  Shut up.

All in all, I'm doing better since the last time I checked in.  I'm trying hard to enjoy myself tonight.  Tomorrow, a lot of important things are happening.  But I have to go now.  So I'll tell you when they happen.  Yeah.

I feel like such a pathtic loser for updating this so often.

I feel very confused.  At school today I just kept thinking, "This is great, but it can't be my life.  There's no way this can be my life."  And if you guys lived in my shoes for a few days, you would agree with me.  No one in any of my classes hate me, though I see a few faces that are hard for me to forgive. (Robert Carmono... x_x)  I love to play my instrument(s), but I can't stand the fucking marching, and it seems like Ahbirnav is picking on me specifically.  I know he isn't, but damn it seems like it.  Just because I'm tired and still don't know the drills and stuff very well.  And wow, marching would be sooo much more fun if I had a close friend in it.  But none of this bothered me until Dan called me today and talked about what you guys were doing.

Then my perfect mood between apathy and exaustion snapped and I yelled at Dave, which got me in trouble, then I ate dinner where mom is trying to be all nice and all it's doing is pissing me off, because someone being nice to me is not what is going to fix this, but it's confusing because I don't know what I or anyone else can do to fix it.  Then I went on a bike ride and called Dan back.  He's going to be the Cheat tomorrow, which is cool.

I'm hungry all the time but I never feel like eating now.  Like, I know that's what I'm feeling, but it's like I think it's an illution.

Ooo, I just figured out why I've been so upset... I'm such an idiot.  xD  No wonder.

I rarely, if ever, trust even my dearest friends.  I really haven't tursted them in the past but over the last six months I started trusting you guys a lot, and now I feel like you all don't miss me.  That's why I was upset.  And what makes it worse is that the only thing I have in commen with Jenny right now is that we are riding the same bus.  God, this has been so bloody obvious... I feel dumb. o_o

And no, it's not your fault, this is one of my problems.  You are in no way responsable for my abandonment issues.  I wonder why I feel the need to be reassured that I am loved, or at least liked?  My mother always told me she loved me, but eventually it felt like she was obligated to say it, not that she really felt it.  Perhaps I want to avoid people feeling obligated to like me?  I don't know.  I'm a pretty screwed up person, but wow am I preaching to the chouir.

La la la.  This is me pretending to be happy.  Spooky is getting put to sleep on Tuesday.  Tomorrow is my first day at a new school full of kids I don't really know.  I'm really nervous, I don't know if they will like me, I know that after the first two weeks I won't care if they like me or not, then I have a whole thing with my unemployed father to deal with... he's just around way too much.  Waaaay too much.  Really cramping my style, you know? >(

I'm gonna miss my friends, but what can I do!?  I can't sneak out until my dad gets another job, I have to go to band practice after school anyway, I am not allowed to see Jenny because god forbid I care about my friends, and I wish I could just freeze time until I've tied up all the loose ends.

Good luck first day of school, everyone, and by the end of this week I will have stopped my incessant whining. xD

A true Story. A religion teacher assigned her class an essay on what
makes a good Christian. One student wrote about praying nightly, say no
to abortion, banning gay marriage, and donating money. The other
student wrote about talking to God and allowing people to enjoy their
lives, and supporting gay marriage. The day the teacher was to hand the
papers back, she called up the second student and told him she would
pray for him when he went to hell. The student asked why would he be
going to hell, and why he got an F on his paper. The teacher told him
that Catholisim is against gay marriage. The student looked at her for
a minute, then said aloud, "I'm gay." The teacher kicked him out of
class as if he had said fuck or worshiped Satan. A girl in the back of
class who had a boyfriend and was obviously straight got up and left
too.

If you would leave the classroom, repost this. It
doesn't matter if you're straight, bi, or gay. It doesn't matter if
you're Catholic or not. Everyone is a human being and deserves
happiness.

I AM FINALLY HOME.  YAY.  

But ugh, it's so hot in here and I have another cold.  That's what you get with at least six girls and a chaperone living in a small cabin with... limited... showering facilities.

I have a lot to say.  But mostly I missed everyone and I don't feel like typing a lot.  So I won't.

I felt really back for Ahbernov.  His name is taking too long to type and I spelled it wrong anyway so I'm gonna call him B'nav, his nickname, in my LJ.  In one night he had to deal with at least two emotional breakdowns, one from Kate, the other tenor sax, and Jill, one of the altos.  I'll tell you why I hate it later, but one of the creatures there is a horrible piece of shit and needs to die.  It's called Alex.  I'll tell you more later.

I WISH I WAS GOING TO COFFMAN. ;_;  It makes me more sad now than it did all those other years I knew.  I hate knowing that it will be really really hard to make new friends, and I will have almost no time to spend with the few I do make or have.  I do not make good first impressions anywhere.  Ever.  None of the friends I have now liked me when they first met me.  Oh dear, I appear to have made myself emo.  I should stop, but I really don't want to.  It's hard to pull yourself out of a slump.  But I think I will anyway, because this isn't going anywhere.  I'll go make up a song about Chex Mix.

I had a freaky nightmare that I know you'll just love to hear, Meep!  You will love it!  It totally freaked me out though, and I put the light on for about two hours after I woke up.  Okay, I'll tell you all now:

The world has flooded and the remaining humans all live in these strongholds underwater.  So when they need to kill someone through the death penalty or something like that, they just throw them out this hatch and the person drowns.  Bada bing bada boom.

So they're gonna kill this serial killer, and right before he falls into the hatch, he grabs me and drags me in with him, thinking that they'll send something in to get me and have to pull him back up too.  But after a very brief discussion, they decide it would be safer if he dies now, even if someone else has to die with him.

My sister overhears this and decides that this is intolerable and jumps in after me.  (Apparently, in the future, I have a sister.)  So she jumps in and swims over to us, and the serial killer is all pissed off.  He swims over, he had tied me up somehow with rope he magically pulled out of nowhere, and starts littereally ripping her apart limb from limb.  All I could really see was a girl getting vicously attacked, then a lot of bubbles and crap, and then a bloody, oozy, fleshy mass of what was perviously my sister floating in the water.  Well, then he swam back over to me, but that seems sort of obvious, so yeah.

We're near a shipwreak, and he finds this rusty dagger, and slices apart some of the sail to blindfold me.  So now I'm blindfolded, but I can still see glances of what's going on.  I can talk though, and I ask him what he's doing, and then where he's going becuase he's swimming away.  I know he's going over to my sister's remains, but I don't know what he did there.

So then he swims back over to me, and I guess he did this to shut me up or make an example of me or something along those lines, starts stabbing me like, well, a crazed serial killer.  o.o  Yeah.  So I kinda go "Ah!" when I realize what's happening but shut up after that little sound for whatever reason.  He keeps this up for a while though, and he's mostly stabbing along my arms, upper torso, and head.  He ties me back to him, and starts swimming back towards the stronghold, when I get one of those weird feelings that you can only get when you are either in a dream or when you've just realized something incredably important about something or someone you care deeply about.

I ask, "Wait...  You picked something up, didn't you?"

But this guy doesn't talk, duh, so I turn and get one of those sight flashes through my blindfold, and he is carrying something fleshy, and I am looking outragously bloody.  And he is carrying my face, and I look at my face, and it's ripped off, and the only thing keeping my eyeballs from falling out is the blindfold.

And at that moment, I know he's going to use my torn off face as a mask to get into the stronghold.  Then I wake up.

It doesn't sound scary now, but at the time I was really freaked out,  I put the light on for two hours and reviewed my music.

Fin.

Gimme a minute...  It'll come back to me.  (The time is 8:14 now.)


Oh!  It's these dreams I keep having!  (Now it's 8:16)

A few nights ago I had a dream about the charecters from Malcom in the Middle.  The Malcom creature had told his brothers how to curse someone with a snake.  His brothers do it, and find it to be sucessful.  Then they start doing it to him.  Malcom goes to his dad to tell him to stop them, but his dad is hesitant because then, for whatever reason, he would have to tell them about Malcom's big-ass football helmet.  And he doesn't want to do that because then they would be jelous.  Okay, sure, it's a dream.  But I know from experiance that whenever I remember I dream I have then it means something.  So I looked up the things that it meant.

I know that snakes can represent a variety of things, but in the dream they kept trying to bite the Malcom creature.  That represents hidden fears.  A shrine, like the one they had to set up outside his bedroom, means I'm concentrating too much of my energy on one aspect of my life.  A helmet means that I need to keep my thoughts and/or ideas closely gaurded.  And, seeing as everytime they said that, they called it a big-ass football helmet, it must be a big-ass thought or idea.  As far as I can tell, that means that I have a secret fear or a hidden fear that needs to be closely gaurded and am spending too much of my time on it, and the people I tell want to keep it a secret from the people it effects.

The other dream I had was a group of boy scouts climbing a mountain and being very happy about it.  It also involved some sort of video game and me looking very, very goth while playing it.


To see a mountain represents some sort of major obsticle in your life that you need to overcome, and to me, boy scouts are the goodie-two-shoe people that I always want to outdo because they act so nice they are almost not human.  For me to be gothic represents something, I know it, but I can't figure it out.  I think I was partially upset because I either could not or would not climb the mountain.  Maybe the boy scouts went in my place?  I dunno.  The video game represents my ability to control or manipulate others, so maybe I did make the boy scouts climb the mountain for me... It can also mean that I'm trying to escape and not face the problems in my real life.

Tell me what you guys think about this, please.  I also want to know which seems most probable, and any diffrence in interpretations.

Oh, and I remember that the boy scouts were eating cookies.  Cookies mean that I will let trivial little problems bother me, but I think it will mean that I will let other people's problems bother me, because I wasn't the one eating the cookies.
